As neem’s oo y leeideil trooid mean Yudea, derrey hig oo roish Jerusalem; as nee’m dty stoyl-reill y hoiagh ayns y vean echey; as nee oo ad y imman myr kirree ta fegooish bochil, as cha jean moddey wheesh as fosley veeal dt’oi: son va ny reddyn shoh inshit dooys cordail rish my ysseree, as v’ad soilshit dou, as ta mee er my choyrt dy insh dhyt.
Eisht bynney lesh Holofernes as ooilley e harvaantyn ny goan eck; as ghow ad yindys mooar jeh’n chreenaght eck as dooyrt ad,
Cha vel lheid y ven veih’n derrey chione jeh’n theihll gys y chione elley, chammah son aalid eddin as goan creeney.
Myr eddin dooyrt Holofernes ree, Ta Jee er n’yannoo dy mie ayns coyrt uss roish y pobble, dy voddagh niart ’ve ayns ny laueyn ainyn, as toyrt-mow orroosyn ta soiagh beg jeh my hiarn’s.

As nish t’ou chammah bwaagh ayns dt’eddin, as jesh ayns dt’ocklyn: son shickyrys my nee uss myr t’ou er ghra, bee’n Jee ayds yn Jee aym’s, as nee uss cummal ayns thie ree Nabuchodonosor, as bee mooar er ny yannoo jeed trooid y slane seihll.
Eisht hug eh sarey dy choyrt lhieu stiagh ee raad va ny siyn argid echey soit: as doardee eh dy begin daue gaarlaghey j’ee jeh’n beaghey echey hene, as dy begin j’ee giu jeh’n feeyn echey hene.
As dooyrt Judith, Cha n’ee
Eisht dooyrt Holofernes ree, My aillys yn farral t’ayd, kys oddys mainyn ’lheid y chur dhyt? son cha vel unnane marin jeh dty ashoon.
Eisht dooyrt Judith rish, Myr ta dt’annym bio, my hiarn, cha baar dty inney-veyl ny reddyn shen t’aym, roish my vees y Chiarn er n’obbraghey liorish my laue’s ny reddyn shen t’eh er chiarail.
Eisht hug sharvaantyn Holofernes lhieu stiagh ’sy chabbane ee as chaddil ee derrey’n vean-oie, as dirree ee tra ve er n’gholl lesh cheu arrey yn voghrey.
As hug ee fys Holofernes, gra, Lhig da my hiarn nish sarey ’choyrt dy vod dty inney-veyl goll magh gys padjer.

Eisht doardee Holofernes da e ghard gyn ad dy lhiettal ee: myr shen duirree ee ’sy chabbane three laa, as hie ee magh ’syn oie, ayns coan Vethulia, as niee ee ee-hene ayns farrane ushtey liorish y champ.
As tra haink ee magh, hir ee er y Chiarn Jee dy Israel eh dy ynsagh j’ee yn aght dy hroggal seose cloan e pobble.
Myr, shen haink ee stiagh glen, as duirree ee ’sy chabbane, derrey ghow ee e beaghey ’syn astyr.
As er y chiarroo laa ren Holofernes giens da e harvaantyn hene er-lheh, as cha chuirr eh veg jeh ny fir-oik gys y lhongey.
Eisht dooyrt eh rish Bagoas yn fer-spoiyt, er e churrym va ooilley ny v’echey, Immee nish, as coyrlee yn ven Hebrewnagh shoh ta mayrt, dy heet stiagh hooin as dy ee as dy iu marin.
Son cur-my-ner, bee eh nearey dooin, my lhigg-ys mayd raad da lheid y ven, fegooish v’er gheddyn y cheshaght eck; son mannagh dayrn mayd hooin ee, gearys ee orrin gys nyn scammylt.

Eisht jimmee Bagoas veih kionfenish Holofernes, as haink eh huic, as dooyrt eh, Nagh lhig da’n ven aeg aalin shoh ve agglagh dy heet gys my hiarn, as ooashley ’gheddyn kiongoyrt rish, as dy iu feeyn, as ve reagh marin, as ve jeant yn laa shoh myr unnane jeh’n inneenyn ny Assyrianee ta shirveish ayns thie Nabuchodonosor.
Eisht dooyrt Judith [rish], Quoi ta mish dy derr-in obbal da my hiarn? son shickyrys cre erbee ta e haitnys neem’s dy tappee y yannoo, as bee eh my voggey gys laa my vaaish.

Myr shen hrog ee urree, as hug ee moo’ee e coamrey as ooilley e garmadyn ben, as hie yn inney-veyl eck as skeayl ee craitnyn meeley er y laare j’ee kiart jeeragh er Holofernes; hooar ee ad voish Bagoas son e hymmyd gagh laa, dy voddagh ee soie gys e bee orroo.
Nish tra va Judith er jeet stiagh as er hoie sheese, va cree Holofernes er-cannoo lhee, as v’eh dy mooar geearree yn cheshaght eck; son v’eh farkiaght er caa dy violagh ee, er-dyn laa, honnick eh ee.
As dooyrt Holofernes ree, Iu nish, as bee reagh marin.
Eisht dooyrt Judith, Nee’m giu nish, my hiarn, er-yn-oyr as dy vel my vea er ny vooadaghey ayn-yms yn laa shoh, ny smoo na dy chooilley laa neayrys ruggyr mee.
Eisht ghow ee as ren ee gee as giu kiongoyrt rish jeh shen ny va’n ven aeg eck-hene er n’aarlaghey j’ee.
As ghow Holofernes taitnys mooar ayn-jee, as d’iu eh lane smoo dy feeyn ny v’eh er n’iu ec keayrt erbee ayns laa neayrys ruggyr eh.

Nish tra va’n astyr er jeet, ren e harvaantyn siyr dy gholl rhymboo, as ghooin Bagoas e chabbane cheu-mooie, as hug eh ny tendeilee er-sooyl veih kionefenish e hiarn, as jimmee ad gys nyn lhiabbaghyn: son v’ad ooilley tooillit, er-y-fa dy row yn giens er ny ve choud.
As va Judith faagit ny lomarcan ’sy chabbane, as va Holofernes ny lhie sheeynt er e lhiabbee: son v’eh lhome-lane dy feeyn.

Nish hug Judith sarey da e hinney-veyl dy hassoo cheu-mooie jeh e shamyr-lhiabbagh, as dy uirraght son eckish dy heet magh, myr ren ee gagh laa: son dooyrt ee dy darragh ee magh gys e padjeryn, as loayr ee rish Bagoas gys y chione cheddin.

Myr shen jimmee [ad] ooilley magh, as cha row unnane faagit ’sy chamyr-lhiabbagh, edyr beg ny mooar. Eisht hass Judith liorish yn lhiabbee echey, as dooyrt ee ayns e cree, O Hiarn Yee, jeh dy chooilley phooar, jeeagh ec y traa shoh er obbyr my laueyn son yrjaghey Yerusalem.
Son nish y traa dy chooney lesh dt’eiraght, as dy chooilleeney ny reddyn ta mish er n’ghoaill ayns laue gys toyrt-mow ny noidyn t’er n’irree nyn ’oi.
Eisht haink ee gys essyn ny lhiabbagh, v’ec kione Holofernes, as ghow ee neose e chliwe jeh shen,
As haink ee gys e lhiabbee, as ghow ee greim er folt e ching, as dooyrt ee, Niartee mee, O Hiarn Yee dy Israel, yn laa shoh.
As woaill ee daa cheayrt er e wannal lesh ooilley e niart, as ghow ee er-sooyl e chione jeh,
As hyndaa ee e chorp sheese jeh’n lhiabbee, as ghow ee yn coodagh neose jeh ny essynyn; as er-y-chooyl ny lurg shen hie ee magh, as hug ee kione Holofernes da e hinney-veyl;

As hug ish eh ayns e poagey-bee: myr shen hie ad ny-neesht magh cooidjagh myr boallagh ad gys padjer: as tra v’ad er gheddyn shaghey yn camp, ghow ad mygeayrt y choan, as hie ad seose slieau Vethulia, as haink ad gys ny giattyn echey.

Eisht dooyrt Judith foddey jeh rish yn arrey v’ec y yiat, Foshil, foshil-jee nish yn giat: ta Jee, eer yn Jee ain, marin dy hoilshaghey e phooar foast ayns Jerusalem, as e hroshid noi’n noid, myr t’eh eer er n’yannoo yn laa shoh.
Nish tra cheayll deiney yn ard-valley eck e coraa, ren ad siyr dy gholl sheese gys giat yn ard-valley oc, as deie ad er shanstyryn yn ard-valley.

Eisht roie ad ooilley dy cheilley, chammah beg as mooar, son ve joarree daue dy row ee er jeet: myr shen doshil ad y giat, as lhig ad stiagh ad, as doad ad aile son soilshey, as hass ad runt mygeayrt-y-moo.

Eisht dooyrt ee roo lesh ard-choraa, Cur-jee moylley, cur-jee moylley gys Jee, (ta mee dy ghra), son cha vel eh er ghoaill er-sooyl e vyghin voish thie Israel, agh t’eh er stroie ny noidyn ain liorish my laue’s yn oie shoh.

Myr shen ghow ee yn kione ass y phoagey, as yeeagh ee daue eh, as dooyrt ee roo, Cur-my-ner kione Holofernes, ard-chaptan armee Assur, as cur-my-ner yn coodagh ayn v’eh ny lhie ayns e veshtyllys; as ta’n Chiarn er varroo eh liorish laue ben.
Myr ta’n Chiarn bio, quoi t’er choadey mish ayns m’immeeaght, ta m’eddin’s er violagh eh gys e hoyrt-mow, foast cha vel eh er chur-rish peccah marym, dy my vhilley as my naaraghey.

Eisht ghow ooilley’n pobble yindys mirrilagh, as chroym ad ad-hene, as hug ad ooashley da Jee, as dooyrt ad lesh un aigney, Bannit dy row uss, O nyn Yee, quoi ta er y laa shoh er choyrt lhiat gys veg noidyn dty phobble.

Eisht dooyrt Osias ree, O inneen, bannit t’ou uss liorish y Jee smoo-ard er-skyn ooilley ny mraane t’er feiy ny cruinney; as bannit dy row’n Chiarn Jee, chroo niau as thalloo, hug royd dy yiarey yn kione jeh ard-er ny noidyn ain.
Son shoh dty hreishteilys cha naag creeghyn deiney, nee cooinaghtyn er pooar Yee son dy bragh.

As dy jyndaa Jee ny reddyn shoh hoods son moylley bra, dy heet dty raad ayns nheeghyn mie, er-y-fa nagh vel oo er vooaraghey dty vioys son seaghyn yn ashoon ain, agh t’er n’ghoaill cooilleeney son nyn draartys, gimmeeaght ayns raad yn ynrickys kiongoyrt rish nyn Yee. As dooyrt ooilley’n pobble, Myr shen dy row eh, myr shen dy row eh.
Eisht dooyrt Judith roo, Clasht-ee rhym nish, my vraaraghyn, as gow-jee yn kione shoh, as crogh-jee eh er y boayl s’yrjey jeh ny voallaghyn eu.

As cha leah as hig y moghrey rish, as y ghrian er jeet magh er yn ooir, gow-jee dagh unnane e wappinyn, as immee-jee, dy chooilley ghooinney loor magh ass yn ard-valley, as soie-jee captan harrish-doo, myr dy ragh shiu sheese ’sy vagher lesh cheu arrey ny Assyrianee; agh ny immee shiu sheese.

Eisht gowee adsyn nyn eillaghyn, as hed as ayns nyn gamp, as troggee ad seose captanyn armee Assur, as nee ad roie gys cabbane Holofernes, agh cha vow ad eh: eisht tuittee aggle orroo, as nee ad chea roish yn eddin eu.
Myr shen hed shiuish as ooilley ny ta cummal ayns ardjyn Israel er yn eiyrtys oc, as ad y stroie myr t’ad goll.

Agh roish my jean shiu ny reddyn shoh, eie-jee hym’s er Achior yn Ammonite, dy vod eh fakin as enney ’choyrt ersyn hoie beg jeh thie Israel, as hug eshyn hooinyn, myr dy beagh eh dy ve currit gy baase.
Eisht deie as er Achior magh ass thie Osias; as tra v’eh er jeet, as er akin kione Holofernes ayns laue dooinney sy chochruinnaght, huitt eh sheese er e eddin, as hie eh my-neealloo.

Agh tra hooar ad eh currit lesh huggey-hene reesht, huitt eh ec cassyn Yudith, as ren eh ammys j’ee, as dooyrt eh, Bannit t’ou uss ayns ooilley cabbane Yuda, as ayns dy chooilley ashoon, tra nee ad clashtyn dt’ennym’s gowee ad yindys.

Nish er-y-fa shen insh dou ooilley ny reddyn t’ou er n’yannoo ayns ny laghyn shoh. Eisht hoilshee Judith da mastey’n pobble ooilley ny ren ee, er-dyn laa hie ee magh derrey’n oor shen v’ee loayrt roo.
As tra v’ee erreish loayrt dyllee yn pobble lesh ard-choraa, as ren ad sheean gerjoil ’syn ard-valley oc.
As tra va Achior er akin ooilley ny va Jee Israel er n’yannoo, chreid eh dy mooar ayns Jee, as yiare eh feill e crackan-chymmylt, as v’eh er ny sniemmey gys thie Israel gys y laa jiu.
As cha leah as va’n moghrey er jeet rish, crogh ad kione Holofernes er y voalley, as ghow dagh dooinney e wappinyn, as jimmee ad magh ayns sheshaghtyn gys glionteenyn y clieau.
Agh tra honnick ny Assyrianee ad, hug ad fys gys nyn leeideilee, quoi haink gys nyn gaptanyn as ny briwnyn, as gys dy chooilley unnane jeh nyn reiltee.

Myr shen haink ad gys cabbane Holofernes as dooyrt ad rish y fer va goaill kiarail jeh ooilley ny reddyn echey, Dooisht nish nyn jiarn: son ta ny kercheenyn dy daaney er jeet sheese noi ain dy chaggey, dy vod ad ’ve dy bollagh er ny’n stroie.
Eisht hie Bagoas stiagh as chronk eh ec dorrys y chabbane; son heill eh dy row eh ny chadley marish Judith.
Agh er-y-fa nagh dooar eh ansoor, doshil eh, as hie eh stiagh ’sy chamyr-lhiabbagh, as hooar eh eh ceauit er y laare marroo, as va e chione goit jeh.
Shen-y-fa dyllee eh dy ard, lesh keayney, as osnaghey, as eam niartal, as raip eh e gharmadyn.
Lurg shen hie eh stiagh ’sy chabbane raad va Judith goaill aaght: as tra nagh dooar eh ee, lheim eh magh gys y pobble, as deie eh,
Ta ny kercheenyn shoh er ghellal dy traitooragh; ta un ven jeh ny Hebrewnee er hayrn scammylt er thie ree Nabuchodonosor: son cur-my-ner, ta Holofernes ny lhie er y thalloo fegooish e chione.
Tra va captanyn armee ny Assyrianee er chlashtyn ny goan shoh, raip ad nyn gooatyn, as va nyn aignaghyn yindyssagh seaghnit, as va coe as feiyr feer vooar trooid magh yn champ.
As tra v’adsyn v’ayns ny cabbaneyn er chlashtyn jeh, ghow ad niart yindys jeh’n red va jeant.

As huitt aggle as creau orroo, myr shen nagh row dooinney erbee by-loys da uirraght ayns shilley da e naboo, agh roie ad magh ooilley lesh-y-cheilley, as hea ad gys dy chooilley raad jeh’n trah, as jeh cheer-ny-gronk.
Adsyn myrgeddin v’er champal ayns ny sleityn runt mygeayrt-y-mysh Bethulia, hea ad ersooyl. Eisht ren cloan Israel, dagh unnane va ny ghooinney-caggee ny mast’oc roie magh orroo.

Eisht hug Osias fys gys Bothomasthem, as gys Bebai, as Chobai, as Cola, as gys ooilley ardjyn Israel, lheid as yinnagh ginsh ny reddyn va jeant, as dy begin daue ooilley roie magh er nyn noidyn dy nyn stroie.

Nish tra va cloan Israel er chlashtyn shen, huitt ad ooilley orroo lesh un aigney, as ad y stroie er-gys Chobai: myrgeddin adsyn v’er jeet veih Jerusalem as veih cheer-ny-gronk, (son va deiney er n’insh daue cre ny reddyn va jeant ayns camp ny noidyn oc,) as adsyn v’ayns Galaad, as ayns Galilee, d’eiyr ad orroo lesh stroialtys mooar, derrey v’ad shaghey Damascus as ny slystyn echey.
As y chooid elley va baghey ec Bethulia, huitt ad er camp Assur, as spooill ad ad, as hooar ad mooarane berchys.
As cloan Israel hyndaa veih’n cragh hooar shen ny va fooillagh; as hooar ny baljyn beggey as ny ard-valjyn, v’ayns ny sleityn as ’sy trah, ymmodee spooillaghyn; son va’n cheshaght feer vooar.
Eisht haink Joachim yn ard-saggyrt, as shendiaght cloan Israel va baghey ayns Jerusalem, dy chur-my-ner ny reddyn mie va Jee er hoilshaghey da Israel, as dy akin Judith, as dy ghoaill boggey jee,
As tra haink ad huic, vannee ad ee lesh un aigney, as dooyrt ad ree, T’ou uss ard-voylley Yerusalem, t’ou uss gloyr vooar Israel, t’ou boggey mooar yn ashoon ain:

T’ou er n’yannoo ooilley ny reddyn shoh liorish dty laue: t’ou er n’yannoo lane mie da Israel, as ta Jee booiagh lesh y chooid cheddin: bannit dy row uss jeh’n Chiarn Ooilley-niartal son dy bragh farraghtyn; as dooyrt ooilley’n pobble, Myr shen dy row eh.

As ren y pobble spooilley yn camp son choud as jeih laa as feed: as hug ad cabbane Holofernes da Judith, as ooilley e obbraghyn-argid, as lhiabbaghyn, as siyn, as ooilley e chooid: as ghow ee eh as hug ee eh er e mule; as hooar ee e cartyn aarloo, as hug ee ad ny lhie orroo shen.
As roie ooilley mraane Israel cooidjagh dy akin ee, as vannee ad ee, as ren ad daunsin y yannoo ny mast’oc er-son: as ghow ee banglaneyn ayns e laue, as chur ee myrgeddin da ny mraane va maree.

As hug ad attey-olive urreeish as er e hinney-veyl va maree, as hie ee ayns toshiaght ooilley’n pobble ’sy daunsin, leeideil ooilley ny mraane: as hie ooilley deiney Israel geiyrt orroo ayns nyn eillaghyn lesh attaghyn-blaa, as arraneyn ayns nyn meeal.
Eisht hie Judith lesh yn arrane shoh dy hoyrt booise ayns ooilley Israel, as ghow ooilley’n pobble mareeish lesh yn arrane-moyllee shoh.
As dooyrt Judith, Gow-jee toshiaght gys my Yee lesh timbrelyn, gow-jee arrane gys my Hiarn lesh cymballyn: cloie-jee huggeysyn arrane noa: soie-jee mooar jeh, as eie-jee er e ennym.
Son ta Jee brishey ny caggaghyn: son mastey ny campyn ayns mean y pobble t’eh er livrey mish ass ny laueyn ocsyn ren my hranlaasey.
Haink Assur magh ass ny sleityn veih’n twoaie, haink eh marish jeih thousaneyn jeh e armee, earroo yn chooid cheddin ren lhiettal ny thooillaghyn, as ta ny sidooryn-cabbyl oc er choodaghey ny croink.

Ren eh boggys dy loshtagh eh seose my ardjyn, as dy marragh eh my gheiney aegey lesh y chliwe, as cloan-ny-kee y scoltey noi’n thalloo, as my oikanyn y ghoaill myr cragh, as my voidynyn myr spooilley.
Agh ta’n Chiarn Ooilley-niartal er lhiettal ad liorish laue ben.
Son cha huitt yn fer niartal liorish ny deiney aegey, chamoo dy ren mec ny Titanee eh y varroo, ny foawir thollee soiagh er: agh ghow Judith inneen Verari yn vree ass lesh aalid e heddin.

Son hug ee jee garmad e treoghys son dy hroggal seose adsyn va tranlaasit ayns Israel, as ren ee e heddin y ooillaghey lesh ooill, as chiangle ee e folt ayns quoif, as coamrey aanrit y ghoaill dy chur shaghrynys er.
Hug ny carraneyn eck cleayn er e hooillyn, ghow yn aalid eck seose e aigney, as hie’n cliwe cam trooid e wannal.
Va ny Persianee er-creau ec y daanys v’ayn-jee, as va ny Medeyn agglit lesh y dunnallys eck.
Eisht dyllee my vooinjer heaghnit lesh boggey, as m’eallagh annoon deie dy ard; agh ghow adsyn ard-yindys: hrog ad-shoh seose nyn goraaghyn, agh v’adsyn tilgit bun-ry-skyn.
Ta mec ny mraane aegey er holley trooid ad, as er nyn lhottey myr cloan wagaantagh: ren ad cherraghtyn liorish caggey’n Chiarn.
Goym’s arrane noa gys y Chiarn: O Hiarn, t’ou uss mooar as gloyroil, yindyssagh ayns niart, as erskyn-towse lajer.
Lhig da dy chooilley chretoor uss y hirveish: son loayr oo as v’ad jeant; hug oo magh dty spyrryd as ren eh ad y chroo, as cha vel unnane erbee oddys shassoo noi dty choraa.
Son bee ny sleityn er nyn scughey veih nyn undinyn lesh ny ushtaghyn; nee ny creggyn lheie myr kere kiongoyrt rhyt: foast t’ou myghinagh dauesyn ta goaill aggle royd.
Son ta ooilley ny ouralyn beggan dhyt son soar millish, as cha vel ooilley yn eeh fondagh son dty hebbal-losht: agh eshyn ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn t’eh mooar ec dy chooilley hraa.

Smerg da ny ashoonyn ta girree seose noi my chynney; gowee yn Chiarn Ooilley-niartal cooilleeney orroo ayns laa yn vriwnys, liorish aile as beishteigyn y choyrt ’syn eill oc; as ennys adsyn ad, as vees ad dobberan son dy bragh.
Nish cha leah as v’ad er n’gholl stiagh ayns Jerusalem, hug ad ooashley da’n Chiarn; as cha leah as va’n pobble er ny ghlenney, heb ad nyn jebbalyn-losht, as nyn jebbalyn-arraltagh, as nyn ghiootyn.
Ren Judith neesht soylley ’ghoaill jeh ooilley cooid Holofernes, va’n pobble er choyrt j’ee, as chur ee yn coodagh, v’ee er n’ghoaill ass e hamyr-lhiabbagh, son gioot gys y Chiarn.
Myr shen ren y pobble tannaghtyn giensal ayns Jerusalem kiongoyrt rish yn ynnyd casherick son choud as three meeaghyn, as duirree Judith maroo.
Lurg y traa shoh hyndaa dy chooilley unnane gys e eiraght hene, as jimmee Judith gys Bethulia as duirree ee ayns e cummal hene, as v’ee ’sy traa eck ooasle ayns ooilley’n cheer.
As va ymmodee dy hirrey ee, agh cha row veg ec fer erbee dy yannoo ree ooilley laghyne bea, lurg da Manasses e sheshey ve marroo, as chaglit gys e phobble.

Agh ren ee bishaghey ny smoo as ny smoo ayns ooashley, as daase ee shenn ayns thie e sheshey; v’ee queig feed blein as queig dy eash, as hug ee reamys da e hinney-veyl; myr shen hooar ee baase ayns Bethulia: as doanluck ad ee ayns ooig Vanasses e sheshey.
As ren thie Israel dobberan er-e-son shiaght laa: as my dooar ee baase, rheynn ee e cooid orroosyn ooilley va jeh kynney sniessey Vanasses e sheshey, as orroosyn va jeh’n kynney sniessey eck hene.
As cha row unnane erbee hug aggle er cloan Israel arragh ayns laghyn Yudith, ny son traa liauyr lurg e baaish.
As ad shoh goan y lioar ren Baruch, mac Nerias, mac Maasias, mac Sedecias, mac Asadias, mac Chelcias, y scrieu ayns Babylon.
Ayns y wheiggoo vlein, as ayns y chiaghtoo laa jeh’n vee, ec y traa ghow ny Chaldeanee Jerusalem as eh y lostey lesh aile.
As lhaih Baruch goan y lioar shoh ayns clashtyn Yechonias, mac Yoachim ree Yudea, as ayns clashtyn ooilley yn slieh haink dy eaishtagh rish y lioar,

As ayns clashtyn y vooinjer ooasle, as mee y ree, as ayns clashtyn ny shanstyryn, as ooilley’n pobble, voish y fer s’inshley gys y fer s’yrjey, eer ooilley adsyn va baghey ec Babylon liorish awin Sud.
Er shoh ren ad dobberan, trostey, as padjer ’ghoaill kiongoyrt rish y Chiarn.
Ren ad myrgeddin argid y hymsagh, gagh dooinney gys rere e phooar:
As hug ad eh gys Jerusalem gys Joachim yn ard-saggyrt, mac Chelcias, mac Salom, as gys ny saggyrtyn, as gys ooilley’n pobble va ry-gheddyn marish ec Jerusalem.

As ec y traa cheddin tra v’eh er gheddyn siyn thie’n Chiarn, va goit magh ass y chiamble, dy chur ad reesht gys cheer Yudea, yn jeihoo laa jeh’n vee Sivan, ta shen dy ghra, ny siyn argid va Sedeclas mac Yosias ree Yudea er n’yannoo,
Lurg da Nabuchodonosor ree Vabylon v’er ghoaill er-sooyl Jechonias, as ny princeyn, as ny cappee, as ny deiney niartal, as pobble ny cheerey, veih Jerusalem, as ad y chur lesh gys Babylon.
As dooyrt ad, Cur-my-ner, ta shinyn er choyrt hiu argid dy chionnagh diu chebbalyn-losht, as chebbalyn-peccah, as soar-millish, as fow shiuish manna [aarloo], as cheb-jee er altar y Chiarn Jee ain;
As guee-jee son bioys Nabuchodonosor ree Vabylon, as son bioys Valthasar e vac, dy vod nyn laghyn er y thalloo ’ve myr laghyn flaunys:

As ver y Chiarn niart dooin, as nyn sooillyn y hoilshaghey, as nee mayd baghey fo scaa Nabuchodonosor ree Vabylon, as fo scaa Belthasar e vac, as nee mayd ad y hirveish ymmodee laghyn, as foayr y gheddyn ’sy chilley oc.
Guee-jee myrgeddin er-ny-son ainyn gys y Chiarn nyn Yee, son ta shin er n’yannoo peccah noi’n Chiarn nyn Yee; as er-gys y laa jiu cha vel corree yn Chiarn as e yymmoose er ny hyndaa voin.
As nee shiu lhaih yn lioar shoh ta shinyn er choyrt hiu dy yannoo goaill-rish ayns thie’n Chiarn, er ny feaillaghyn as ny laghyn casherick.
As jirrys shiu, Gys y Chiarn ta bentyn ynrickys, agh hooinyn nearey eddin, myr te er jeet gy kione yn laa-jiu, as mooinjer Yuda, as da cummaltee Yerusalem,
As da nyn reeaghyn, as da nyn brinceyn, as da nyn saggyrtyn [as da nyn vadeyryn,] as da nyn ayraghyn:
Son ta shin er n’yannoo peccah kiongoyrt rish y Chiarn.
As er n’yannoo mee-viallys er, as cha vel shin er n’eaishtagh rish coraa yn Chiarn nyn Yee dy hooyl ayns ny annaghyn hug eh dooin dy foshlit:

Er-dyn laa hug y Chiarn lesh nyn shenn-ayraghyn magh ass cheer Egypt, derrey’n laa t’ayn jiu, ta shin er ny ve mee-viallagh gys y Chiarn nyn Yee, as ta shin er ve foiljagh ayns gyn coyrt geill da e choraa.

Er-y-fa shen ren ny huilk lhiantyn hooin, as y mollaght, doardee’n Chiarn liorish Moses e harvaant ec y traa hug eh lesh nyn ayraghyn magh ass cheer Egypt, dy choyrt dooinyn cheer ta taaley lesh bainney as mill, ’naght myr ry-akin yn laa shoh.
Ny-yeih cha vel shinyn er choyrt geill da coraa yn Chiarn nyn Yee, cordail rish goo ooilley ny phadeyryn ren eshyn y choyrt hooin:
Agh deiyr dy chooilley ghooinney er smooinaghtyn e ghrogh chree hene, dy hirveish jeeghyn joarree, as dy yannoo olk ayns shilley’n Chiarn nyn Yee.
Shen-y-fa ta’n Chiarn er n’yannoo mie e ghoo, ren eh ’ockley magh nyn ’oi, as noi nyn mriwnyn va briwnys Israel, as noi nyn reeaghyn, as noi nyn brinceyn, as noi deiney Israel as Juda,
Dy chur lesh orrin kerraghyn dewiley, lheid as nagh haghyr rieau roie fo ooilley niau, myr haink eh gy kione ayns Jerusalem, cordail rish ny reddyn va scruit ayns lioar Voses;
Dy jinnagh dooinney gee feill e vac hene, as feill e inneen hene.

Ny sodjey na shen, t’eh er livrey ad dy ve ayns ammys da ooilley ny reeriaghtyn ta runt mygeart-y-mooin, dy ve myr oltooan as traartys mastey ooilley’n sleih runt mygeayrt, raad ta’n Chiarn er nyn skeayley.
Myr shoh va shin ceauit sheese, as cha nee troggit seose, er-y-fa dy vel shin er n’yannoo peccah noi’n Chiarn y Jee ain, as nagh vel shin er ve biallagh da e choraa.
Gys y Chiarn [nyn Yee] ta bentyn ynrickys: agh hooinyn as gys nyn ayraghyn nearey foshlit, myr ta ry-akin jiu.
Son ta ooilley ny briwnyssyn shoh er jeet orrin, ad ta’n Chiarn er n’ockley magh nyn ’oi.
Ny-yeih cha vel [shin er] n’ghoaill padjer kiongoyrt rish y Chiarn, dy voddagh dy chooilley unnane chyndaa voish smooinaghtyn e ghrogh chree.
Shen-y-fa dreill y Chiarn arrey harrin son olk, as ta’n Chiarn er chur lesh orrin eh: son ta’n Chiarn cairal ayns ooilley e obbraghyn, quoid t’eh er harey dooin.
Foast cha vel shinyn er n’eaishtagh rish e choraa, dy hooyl ayns ny annaghyn ta’n Chiarn er hoiaghey roin.

As nish, O Hiarn Yee dy Israel, t’er chur lhiat dty phobble magh ass cheer Egypt lesh laue niartal, as roih ard, as lesh cowraghyn as yindyssyn, as lesh pooar vooar, as er gheddyn dhyt hene ennym mooar, myr ta ry-akin jiu:
O Hiarn nyn Yee, ta shin er chur rish peccah, ta shin er n’yannoo dy mee-chrauee, ta shin er ghellal dy neuynrick ayns ooilley dty oardaghyn.
Lhig da dty chorree chyndaa voin; son cha vel shin agh beggan faagit mastey ny ashoonyn, raad t’ou er nyn skeayley.
Clasht uss rish nyn badjeryn, O Hiarn, as nyn aghinyn, as livrey shin er y ghraih ayd hene, as cur dooin foayr ’sy chilley ocsyn t’er leeideil shin ersooyl:
Dy vod fys v’ec ooilley’n ooir dy nee uss yn Chiarn y Jee ain, er-y-fa dy vel Israel as e luight enmyssit ort’s.
O Hiarn, jeeagh neose veih dty hie casherick, as smooinee orrin: croym sheese dty chleaysh, O Hiarn, dy chlashtyn rooin.
Foshil dty hooillyn, as cur-my-ner; son ny merriu t’ayns ny oaighyn, nyn anmeenyn ta goit veih nyn girp, cha der da’n Chiarn edyr moylley ny booise:
Agh yn annym ta dy mooar seaghnit, ta gimmeeaght dy injil as moal, as ny sooillyn ta failleil, as yn annym accryssagh, ver dhyts moylley as booise, O Hiarn.
Shen-y-fa cha vel shinyn jannoo nyn aghin imlee kiongoyrt rhyts, O Hiarn nyn Yee, son ynrickys nyn ayraghyn, as ny reeaghyn ain.
Son t’ou uss er ’choyrt magh dty chorree as yymoose orrin, myr t’ou er loayrt liorish dty harvaantyn ny phadeyryn, gra,
Shoh myr ta’n Chiarn dy ghra, Croym-jee sheese nyn gheayltyn dy hirveish ree Vabylon: myr shen uirrys shiu ’sy cheer hug mish da nyn ayraghyn.
Agh mannagh n’eaisht shiu rish coraa yn Chiarn, dy hirveish ree Vabylon,

Ver-yms gys fea ayns ard-valjyn Yuda, as veih cheet magh ass Jerusalem, yn coraa dy yennallys, as y coraa dy voggey, as coraa yn dooinney-poosee, as coraa yn ven-phoosee: as bee’n slane cheer fegooish cummaltee.

Agh cha n’eaishtagh shin rish dty choraa’s, dy hirveish ree Vabylon: shen-y-fa t’ou er n’yannoo mie ny goan shen loayr oo liorish dty harvaantyn ny phadeyryn, eer dy beagh craueyn ny reeaghyn ain, as craueyn ny ayraghyn ain, goit ass nyn ynnydyn.
As cur-my-ner, t’ad ceauit magh gys chiass y laa, as gys rio ny hoie, as hooar ad baase ayns treihyssyn mooarey liorish gortey, liorish y chliwe, as liorish paitt.
As y thie ta enmyssit ort (t’ou er choyrt naardey) myr te ry-akin jiu, son drogh yannoo thie Israel as thie Yuda.
O Hiarn nyn Yee, t’ou er chummal marin lurg ooilley dty vieys, as cordail rish ooilley’n vyghin vooar ayd-hene,
Myr loayr oo rish dty harvaant Moses ayns y laa hug oo sarey da dy scrieu dty leigh kiongoyrt rish cloan Israel, gra,
Mannagh n’eaisht shiu rish my choraa, son shickyrys bee’n cheshaght feer vooar shoh er ny hyndaa gys earroo fardailagh mastey ny ashoonyn, raad neem’s ad y skeayley.
Son va fys aym nagh n’eaishtagh ad rhym, er-yn-oyr dy nee pobble creoi wannallagh ad: agh ayns cheer nyn gappeeys smooinys ad orroo hene,
As bee fys oc dy vel mish yn Chiarn nyn Yee: son ver-yms daue cree, as cleayshyn dy chlashtyn:
As nee ad mish y voylley ayns cheer nyn gappeeys, as smooinys ad er m’ennym,
As nee ad chyndaa veih nyn greoi-wannallys, as veih nyn ghrogh-yannoo: son cooinys ad er immeeaght nyn ayraghyn, ren peccah kiongoyrt rish y Chiarn.
As ver-yms lhiam ad reesht gys y cheer yiall mee lesh breearey da nyn ayraghyn, Abraham, Isaac, as Jacob, as bee ad chiarnyn harrish: as nee’yms ad y vishaghey, as cha jean ad parail.
As nee’yms conaant dy bragh farraghtyn y yannoo roo dy ve yn Jee oc, as bee adsyn my phobble: as cha n’eebyr-yms arragh my phobble d’Israel magh ass y cheer shen ta mee er choyrt daue.
O Hiarn Ooilley-niartal, Yee d’Israel, ta’n annym t’ayns angaish, as y spyrryd seaghnit, geamagh hoods.
Clasht, O Hiarn, as jean myghin; son t’ou uss myghinagh: as gow chymmey jin, er-y-fa dy vel shin er chur-rish peccah kiongoyrt rhyt.
Son t’ou uss farraghtyn son dy bragh, as ta shinyn cherraghtyn dy bollagh.

O Hiarn Ooilley-niartal, uss y Jee d’Israel, clasht nish padjeryn ny Israeliteyn marroo, as y chloan oc, t’er n’yannoo peccah kiongoyrt rhyt, as nagh d’eaisht rish y coraa ayds y Jee oc: shen yn oyr dy, vel ny briwnyssyn shoh lhiantyn rooinyn.
Nagh cooinee er mee-chairys nyn shenn-ayraghyn: agh smooinee er dty phooar as dt’ennym ec y traa shoh.
Son t’ou yn Chiarn y Jee ainyn, as uss, O Hiarn, nee mayd y voylley.

As son yn oyr shoh t’ou er choyrt dt’aggle ayns ny creeghyn ain, dy voddagh shin geamagh er dt’ennym, as oo y voylley ayns nyn gappeeys: son ta shin er ghoaill gys nyn aigney ooilley mee-chairys nyn shenn-ayraghyn, ren peccah ’yannoo kiongoyrt rhyt.

Cur-my-ner, ta shin foast yn laa shoh ayns nyn gappeeys, raad t’ou er nyn skeayley, son craid as mollaght, as dy ve fo keesh, cordail rish ooilley meechairys nyn ayraghyn, ren scarrey veih’n Chiarn nyn Yee.
Clasht, Israel, annaghyn y vea, as cur cleaysh dy hoiggal creenaght.
Kys te er haghyrt, Israel, dy vel oo ayns cheer dty noidyn, dy vel oo er n’aase shenn ayns cheer yoarree, dy vel oo neu-ghlen marish ny merriu,
Dy vel uss er dty earroo maroosyn ta goll sheese ayns yn oaie?
T’ou er hreigeil yn farrane dy chreenaght.
Son dy beagh oo er n’immeeaght ayns raad Yee, veagh oo er vaghey ayns shee son dy bragh.
Ynsee c’raad ta creenaght, c’raad ta niart, c’raad ta tushtey; dy vod fys ’ve ayd c’raad ta lhiurid laghyn, as bea, e raad ta soilshey sooilley, as shee.
Quoi t’er gheddyn magh e hynnyd? ny quoi t’er jeet stiagh ayns ny tashtaghyn eck?
C’raad ta princeyn ny ashoonee er n’gholl, as nyn lheid as ren reill ny beishtyn er y thalloo;
Adsyn va cur shaghey nyn draa marish eeanlee’n aer, as adsyn hymsee seose argid as airh ayndoo ta deiney treishteil, as nagh ren jerrey erbee er nyn jaglym?
Son adsyn d’obbree ayns argid, as va cha kiarailagh, as nyn obbraghyn nagh vod ve ronsit magh,
T’ad er lheie ersooyl as er n’gholl sheese gys yn oaie, as ta feallagh elley er jeet seose syn ynnyd oc.
Ta deiney aegey er vakin y toilshey, as er vaghey er yn ooir: agh raad y tushtey cha bione daue,
Chamoo dy hoig ad ny cassanyn eck, ny greim ’ghoaill urree: va’n chloan oc foddey jeh veih’n raad shen.
Cha row clashtyn jeeish ayns Chanaan, chamoo v’ee ry-akin ayns Theman.

Ny Agarreneyn ta shirrey creenaght er yn ooir, marchanyn Veran as Theman, ny jatteryn-skeeal, as adsyn ta ronsagh magh tushtey; cha vel fys er ny ve ec veg jeu shoh er raad y chreenaght, cha gooin lhieu ny cassanyn eck.
O Israel, cre cha mooar as ta thie Yee! as s’mooar ta’n boayl t’eshyn cummal!
Mooar, as cha vel kione elley er; ard, as erskyn towse.
Shen y raad va ny foawir mooarey er-dyn toshiaght, va wheesh ayns thummyd, as cha aghtal ayns caggey.
Ad shoh cha ren y Chiarn y reih, chamoo hug eh raad y tushtey daue:
Agh v’ad stroit, er-y-fa nagh row veg dy chreenaght oc, as ren ad cherraghtyn trooid nyn ommidjys hene.
Quoi t’er gholl seose gys niau as er ghoaill ee, as er chur lesh neose ee veih ny bodjallyn?
Quoi t’er n’gholl harrish y cheayn as er gheddyn ee, as ver lesh ee son airh ghlen?
Cha vel dooinney erbee toiggalagh jeh’n raad eck, ny smooinaghtyn er y chassan eck.
Agh yn fer ta toiggal dy chooilley nhee, shione dasyn ee, as t’eh er gheddyn magh ee lesh e ysseree: eshyn chroo yn seihll son dy bragh, t’eh er lhieeney eh lesh beishtyn kiare-chassagh:
Eshyn ta dy choyrt magh soilshey as te goll, geamagh da reesht, as te coyrt biallys da lesh aggle.
Ren ny rollageyn soilshean ayns nyn shayllyn, as boggey ’ghoaill: tra t’eshyn geamagh daue, t’adsyn gra, Ta shinyn ayns shoh; as myr shen lesh gennallys hug ad soilshey dasyn ren y chroo ad.
Shoh’n Jee ainyn, as cha bee soiagh er ny yannoo jeh nhee erbee elley ayns cosoyllagh jehsyn.
T’eh er gheddyn magh ooilley raad yn ysseree, as er choyrt eh da Jacob e harvaant, as da Israel e haitnys.
Ny lurg shen hoilshee eh eh-hene er y thalloo, as ren eh cummal marish deiney.
Shoh’n lioar jeh annaghyn Yee, as y leigh ta farraghtyn son dy bragh: ooilley adsyn ta dy reayll eh hig ad gys bea; agh nyn lheid as ta dy hreigeil eh yiow ad baase.
Chyndaa uss, O Yacob, as gow greim er: shooill kiongoyrt rish soilshey yn chooid cheddin, dy vod oo ve er dty hoilshaghey.
Nagh cur dt’ooashley da fer elley, chamoo yn red ta vondeishagh dhyt-hene da ashoon quaagh.
O Israel, maynrey ta shinyn: son ta reddyn ta booisal da Jee jeant er fys dooin.
Bee-jee dy yien mie, my phobble, yn imraa d’Israel.
Va shiu er nyn greck gys ny ashoonyn, cha nee son nyn doyrt-mow hene: agh er-y-fa dy ren shiu Jee y ghreinnaghey gys corree, va shiu er nyn livrey gys nyn noidyn.
Son ren shiu nyn ver-croo y vrasnaghey liorish ouralley gys jouyil, as cha nee gys Jee.
Ta shiu er yarrood yn Jee dy bragh farraghtyn ren y chroo shiu; as ta shiu er heaghney Jerusalem ren boandyrys shiu.
Son tra honnick ee jymmoose Yee cheet erriu, dooyrt ee. Eaisht-jee, O shiuish ta baghey mysh Sion: ta Jee er choyrt lesh orrym seaghyn trome;
Son honnick mee cappeeys my vec as my inneenyn, cooid hug y Chiarn lesh orroo.
Lesh boggey ren mish ad y voandyrys; agh hug mee roue ad lesh keayney as dobberan.
Nagh lhig da dooinney erbee boggey ’ghoaill harryms, ta my ven-treoghe, as treigit liorish ymmodee, as er-son peccaghyn my chloan ta mee faagit follym-faase; er-y-fa, dy dug ad cooyl rish leigh Yee.
Cha dug ad geill da e lattyssyn, ny cha huill ad ayns raaidyn e annaghyn, chamoo dy jagh ad ayns ny cassanyn geiyrt er ’syn ynrickys echeysyn.
Lhig daue shen ta baghey mysh Sion cheet, as cooinee-jee er cappeeys my vec as my inneenyn, cooid ta’n Chiarn er choyrt orroo.
Son t’eh er chur lesh orroo ashoon veih foddey, ashoon gyn-nearey, [as jeh glaare quaagh,] nagh ren edyr ain y choyrt da shenn ghooinney, ny chymmey ’ghoaill er lhiannoo.
T’ad shoh er chur lhieu ersooyl cloan deyr-graihagh yn ven-treoghe, as er n’aagail ish va ny lomarcan, follym fegooish inneenyn.
Agh cre’n cooney oddyms y choyrt diu?
Son nee eshyn hug lesh briwnyssyn shoh erriu, shiuish y livrey veih laueyn ny noidyn eu.
Immee-jee reue, O my chloan, immee-jee reue: son ta mish faagit follym-faase.
Ta mee er chur jeem yn coamrey dy hee, as er chur orrym yn aanrit-sack, dy ghoaill my phadjer: neem’s geamagh gys Jee ayns ny laghyn aym’s.
Bee-jee dy yien mie, O my chloan, eie-jee gys y Chiarn, as nee eh shiu y livrey veih pooar as laue ny noidyn eu.
Son ta my hreishteil ayns y Chiarn, dy jean eh shiu y hauail; as ta gerjagh er jeet hym’s veih’n Er casherick, kyndagh rish y vyghin hig hiuish dy leah veih nyn Saualtagh dy bragh farraghtyn.
Son hug mee magh shiu lesh dobberan as keayney: agh ver Jee dooys shiu reesht lesh boggey as gennallys son dy bragh.
’Naght myr ta naboonyn Sion er akin yn chappeeys eu nish: myrgeddin hee ad dy-gerrit yn taualtys eu veih’n Jee ain, nee cheet erriu lesh gloyr vooar, as sollyssid [yn Er ta] dy bragh farraghtyn.
My chloan, surr-jee lesh meenid yn jymmoose t’er jeet erriu veih Jee: son ta’n noid er dty hranlaasey; agh dy-gerrit hee oo e hoyrt-mow, as ver oo dty chass er y wannal echey.
Ta m’eallagh mettey er gholl ayns raaidyn garroo, as v’ad goit ersooyl goll-rish shioltane tayrit liorish ny noidyn.
Bee-jee dy yien mie, O my chloan, as eie-jee gys Jee: son bee shiuish freilt ayns cooinaghtyn liorishyn t’er choyrt ny reddyn shoh erriu.
Son myr ve nyn aigney dy gholl er-shaghryn voish Jee: agh nish er hyndaa, shir-jee er-e-honsyn jeih keayrtyn smoo.
Son eshyn t’er choyrt ny treihyssyn shoh erriu, ver lesh hiu boggey dy bragh farraghtyn reesht marish nyn saualtys.
Gow cree mie, O Yerusalem: son nee eshyn hug yn ennym shen dhyt, uss y gherjaghey.
S’treih t’adsyn ren dty heaghney, as ghow boggey ayns dty lhieggey.
S’treih ta ny ard-valjyn ren sharvaantyn jeh dty chloan; s’treih t’eeish ren goaill dty vec.
Son myr vee boggysagh ec dt’assee, as booiagh jeh dty lhieggey: shen myr vees ee seaghnit son y traartys eck-hene.
Son goym’s ersooyl boggey yn cheshaght vooar eck, as bee’n voyrn eck er ny hyndaa gys dobberan.
Son hig aile urree veih Jee, foddey dy hurranse; as nee jouyil cummal ayn-jee son traa liauyr.
O Yerusalem, jeeagh mygeayrt-y-mood lesh y shiar, as cur-my-ner yn boggey ta cheet hood veih Jee.
Cur-my-ner, ta dty vec cheet ren oo coyrt ersooyl, t’ad cheet er haglym cooidjagh veih’n shiar gys y sheear liorish goo yn Er casherick, goaill boggey ayns Jee ny ghloyr.
Cur jeed, O Yerusalem, yn garmad jeh dty ghobberan as seaghyn, as cur ort yn stoamid dy ghloyr ta cheet voish Jee son dy bragh.
Cur mood garmad dooble jeh’n ynrickys ta cheet voish Jee; as soie attey er dty chione jeh’n ghloyr Veayn.
Son nee Jee dty hollyssid y hoilshaghey da dy chooilley heer fo niau.
Son bee oo er dt’enmys liorish Jee son dy bragh; shee yn ynrickys as gloyr ooashley Yee.

Trog ort, O Yerusalem, [as] shass seose dy ard, as jeeagh mygeayrt lesh y shiar, as cur-my-ner dty chloan er nyn jaglym veih’n neear gys y niar liorish goo, yn Er Casherick, goaill boggey ayns cooinaghtyn jeh Jee.
Son jimmee ad void ry-ny-gosh, as v’ad leeidit ersooyl liorish nyn noidyn; agh ta Jee cur lesh hood ad, ard lesh gloyr, myr cloan y reeriaght.
Son ta Jee er phointeil dy nhegin da dy chooilley chronk ard as shenn vrooinyn ’ve lhieggit sheese, as coan ’ve lhieent seose, dy yannoo yn grunt rea, dy vod Israel goll dy sauchey ayns gloyr Yee.
Ny sodjey, nee eer ny keylljyn, as dy chooilley villey dy hoar-millish, scadoo y cheau harrish Israel liorish sarey Yee.
Son nee Jee Israel y leeideil lesh boggey ayns soilshey e ghloyr lesh yn vyghin as yn ynrickys ta cheet voish hene.
Copy jeh screeuyn ren Jeremy y choyrt hucsyn, va dy ve leeidit nyn gappee gys Babylon liorish ree ny Babylonianee, dy hoilshaghey daue myr v’er ny harey dasyn liorish Jee.
By-chyndagh rish ny peccaghyn ta shiuish er n’yannoo kiongoyrt rish Jee, vees shiu er nyn leeideil ayns cappeeys gys Babylon liorish Nabuchodonosor ree ny Babylonianee.

Myr shen tra vees shiu er jeet gys Babylon, uirrys shiu ayns shen ymmodee bleeantyn, as son earish liauyr, ta shen dy ghra, shiaght sheelogheyn: as eisht ver-yms lhiam ersooyl shiu dy sheeoil veih shen.
Nish nee shiu fakin ayns Babylon jeeghyn d’argid, as d’airh, as dy fuygh, er nyn ymmyrkey seose er geayltyn, ta coyrt ny ashoonyn ayns aggle.
Cur-jee twoaie er-y-fa shen nagh bee shiuish goll-rish joarreeyn, chamoo gow-jee aggle roue, tra hee shiu sheshaght vooar rhymboo as ny-jei, cur ooashley daue.
Agh abbyr-jee ayns nyn greeghyn, O Hiarn, shegin dooinyn uss y ooashlaghey.
Son ta’n ainle aym’s meriu, as mish mee-hene goaill kiarail son nyn anmeenyn.
Er-son y chengey oc te jeant shliawin liorish ny obbreeyn, as t’ad-hene jeant bwee as coodit harrish lesh airh; ny-yeih cha vel ad agh foalsid, as cha vod ad loayrt.
As goaill airh, myr dy beagh eh da moidyn ta aggindagh er moyrn, t’ad jannoo attaghyn son kione ny jeeghyn oc.
Paart dy cheayrtyn neesht ta ny saggyrtyn goaill voish ny jeeghyn oc airh as argid, as stowel eh orroo-hene.
Dy jarroo, dy der ad jeh’n chooid cheddin da ny streebee chadjin, as adsyn y hoiaghey magh myr deiney lesh garmadyn, nagh vel agh jeeghyn d’argid, as jeeghyn d’airh, as dy fuygh.
Foast cha vod ny jeeghyn shoh ad-hene y hauail voish mergey as lhemeen, ga dy vel ad coodit lesh coamrey gorrym-jiarg.
T’ad glenney ny eddinyn oc kyndagh rish joan y chiamble, tra ta lane jeh orroo.
As t’eshyn nagh vod marroo fer ta coyrt y chorree er cummal lorg-reill, myr dy beagh eh briw ny cheerey.
Ta echey myrgeddin ayns e laue yesh skyn-attey as teigh: agh cha vod eh eh-hene y livrey voish caggey as maarlee.
Liorish shoh ta fys roo nagh nee jeeghyn ad: shen-y-fa nagh bee-jee ayns aggle jeu.

Son myr nagh vel saagh ta dooinney dy yannoo ymmyd jeh feeagh veg tra te brisht; eer myr shen te marish ny jeeghyn oc: tra t’ad soit seose ’sy chiamble ta ny sooillyn oc lane dy yoan kyndagh rish ny cassyn ocsyn ta cheet stiagh.

As ’naght myr ta ny dorrysyn jeant shickyr er dy chooilley heu, ersyn ta brasnaghey’n ree, son dy vel eh er ny gheyrey dy hurranse baase: eer shen myr ta’n saggyrtyn jannoo shickyr jeh nyn jiambleyn lesh cooylaghyn, lesh glish, as lesh festyn, er aggle dy bee ny jeeghyn oc er nyn spooilley liorish roosteyryn.
T’ad foaddey cainleyn daue, eer, ny smoo na daue-hene, ny-yeih cha vod ad unnane y akin.
T’ad myr unnane jeh jeaystyn y chiamble, foast jir ad dy vel ny creeghyn oc goll er caigney liorish reddyn snauee ass y thalloo; as tra t’ad gee ad-hene as nyn eaddagh cha vel ad gennaghtyn eh.
Ta ny eddinyn oc doo lesh y jaagh ta cheet magh ass y chiamble.
Er ny kirp as ny king oc ta craitnagyn soie, gollanyn-geayee as ushagyn, as ny keiyt myrgeddin.
Liorish shoh foddee fys ’ve eu nagh vel ad jeeghyn: shen-y-fa nagh gow-jee aggle roue.
Ga dy vel airh moo dy yannoo aalin jeu, mannagh glen ad yn mergey jeh, cha jean ad soilshean: son chamoo tra v’ad er nyn lheie dy dennee ad eh.
Ny reddyn shen ayndoo nagh vel yn ennal, t’ad er nyn gionnaghey son y phrice smoo.
T’ad er nyn ymmyrkey seose er geayltyn, son nagh vel cassyn oc; liorish shoh t’ad soilshaghey da deiney dy vel ad neu-feeu.

T’adsyn myrgeddin ta shirveish ad goaill nearey: son my huittys ad gys y thalloo ec traa erbee, cha vod ad troggal seose reesht jeu-hene: chamoo, my hoie-ys fer ad seose jeeragh, oddys ad gleashagh jeu-hene: chamoo, my vees ad er nyn lhoobey sheese, oddys ad ad-hene y yeeraghey: agh t’ad soiaghey giootyn er y veealloo oc, myr gys deiney marroo.

Er-son ny reddyn t’er ny hebbal huc, ta ny saggyrtyn oc creck as jummal; myr shen neesht, ta ny mraane oc sailley as tashtey paart jeh’n chooid cheddin, agh da’n boght as yn annoonagh cha der ad veg jeh.
Ta mraane neu-ghlen as mraane ’sy lhiabbee-hoalt gee ny ourallyn oc: liorish ny reddyn shoh oddys fys y v’eu nagh vel ad jeeghyn: nagh gow-jee aggle roue.
Son kys oddys ad ve enmyssit jeeghyn? er-yn-oyr dy vel mraane soiagh bee roish ny jeeghyn argid, airh, as fuygh.
As ta ny saggyrtyn soie ayns ny chiambleyn oc, lesh nyn eaddagh raipit, as nyn ging as fassaagyn baarit, as kione-rooisht.
T’ad gyllagh as keayney kiongoyrt rish ny jeeghyn oc, myr ta deiney jannoo ec y farrarey tra ta fer marroo.
Ta ny saggyrtyn myrgeddin goaill jeu ny garmadyn dy choamrey ny mraane as y chloan oc-hene.
Lhig da ve olk ta fer jannoo daue ny mie, cha vod ad cooilleeney ’yannoo er-y-hon: cha vod ad ree y hoiaghey seose, chamoo oddys ad eh y choyrt sheese.
Myrgeddin, cha vod ad edyr berchys ny argid y choyrt: ga, dy jinnagh dooinney breearey huc, as gyn dy reayll eh, cha jean ad shirrey eh.
Cha vod ad dooinney erbee y hauail veih baase, chamoo yn annoonagh y livrey veih’n niartal.
Cha vod ad e hoilshey ’choyrt da dooinney doal, ny cooney lesh dooinney erbee ayns e hennid.
Cha vod ad myghin ’hoilshey da’n ven-treoghe, ny mie y yannoo da’n chloan gyn ayr.
Ta ny jeeghyn maidjey oc, ta coodit lesh airh as argid, goll-rish ny claghyn ta cleiyht ass y clieau: bee adsyn ta cur ooashley daue er nyn goyrt gys nearey.
Kys yinnagh dooinney eisht smooinaghtyn as gra dy vel ad jeeghyn, tra ta eer ny Chaldeanee ad-hene dy vee-ooashlaghey ad?
Quoi my hee ad fer balloo nagh vod loayrt, t’ad dy choyrt lhieu eh, as guee gys Bel dy vod eh loayrt, myr dy beagh eh abyl dy hoiggal.
Foast cha vod ad toiggal shoh ad-hene, as faagail ad: son cha vel oc tushtey erbee.

Ta ny mraane myrgeddin lesh coyrdyn moo, soie ayns ny raaidyn, lostey cledge son soar-millish: agh my ta veg jeu tayrnit liorish fer erbee ta goll shaghey, as lhie marish, t’ee goltooaney e sheshey, son nagh row ee coontit dy ve cha feeu ree hene, ny’n coyrd eck er ny vrishey.
Cre erbee ta jeant ny mast’oc te foalsey: kys oddys eh eisht ve smooinit ny grait dy vel ad jeeghyn?
T’ad jeant liorish seiyr as gauenyn-airhey: cha vod ad ’ve veg arragh agh myr saillish yn obbree ad dy ve.
As cha vod ad shen hene ren jannoo ad dy bragh tannaghtyn foddey; kys eisht oddys ny reddyn ta jeant lioroo ve jeeghyn?
Son daag ad breagyn as oltooanyn dauesyn ta cheet nyn-yei.
Son tra ta cheet orroo caggey erbee ny paitt, ta ny saggyrtyn cur nyn goyrle dy cheilley, c’raad oddys ad ve follit maroosyn.
Kys eisht nagh vod deiney cronnaghey nagh vel ad shen jeeghyn erbee, nagh vod ad-hene y hauail edyr voish caggey, ny voish paitt?
Son fakin nagh vel ad agh fuygh, er ny choodaghey harrish lesh argid as airh, bee fys rish ny lurg shoh dy vel ad foalsey:
As hig eh er-ash baghtal dy liooar da dy chooilley ashoon as ree nagh vel ad jeeghyn erbee, agh obbyr laueyn deiney, as nagh vel veg dy obbyr Yee ayndoo.
Quoi eisht vees mee-hushtagh jeh nagh vel ad jeeghyn edyr?
Son chamoo oddys ad ree y hoiagh seose ’sy cheer, ny fliaghey ’choyrt da deiney.
Chamoo oddys ad briwnys y choyrt ’sy chooish oc hene, ny cooilleeney ghoaill son aggair liorish dy vel ad gyn bree: son t’ad goll-rish fannagyn eddyr aer as thalloo.

Myr shen tra huittys aile er thie ny jeeghyn maidjey, t’er nyn goodaghey harrish lesh airh ny argid, nee ny saggyrtyn oc chea ersooyl, as scapail; agh adsyn ad-hene vees losht veih my-cheilley myr darragyn.
Ny sodjey na shoh, cha vod ad shassoo magh noi ree erbee ny noidyn: kys eisht oddys eh ve smooinit ny grait dy vel ad jeeghyn?
Chamoo dy vel ny jeeghyn maidjey shoh, ta ooilley lesh argid as airh, abyl dy scapail voish maarlee ny roosteyryn.
Yn airh as argid, as ny garmadyn lhieu t’ad coamrit, ta’n vooinjer lajer goaill as goll ersooyl lhieu: chamoo oddys ad cooney lhieu-hene.

Shen-y-fa te ny share dy ve ree ta gys soilshaghey e phooar, er-nonney saagh vondeishagh ayns thie, ta gys ymmyd yn oaner, na dy ve lheid ny jeeghyn; ny dy ve son dorrys er thie, dy reayll sauchey ny reddyn ta sthie ayn, cha nee dy ve lheid ny jeeghyn; ny son frap fuygh ayns plaase, cha nee dy ve lheid ny jeeghyn foalsey.
Son grian, eayst, as rollageyn, liorish dy vel ad sollys, as currit dy chooilleeney nyn oikyn, t’ad biallagh.
Myrgeddin yn tendreil, tra te brishey magh te aashagh dy akin, as er ’naght cheddin ta’n gheay sheidey ayns dy chooilley heer.
As tra ta Jee cur sarey da ny bodjallyn dy gholl magh harrish y slane seihll, t’ad jannoo myr t’er ny hirrey orroo.
As yn aile t’er ny choyrt veih heose dy chur mow croink as keylljyn, te jannoo myr t’er ny harey da: agh ad shid cha vel [ad] goll-roo shoh edyr ayns shilley ny pooar.
Er-y-fa shen cha vel eh dy ve smooinit ny grait dy vel ad jeeghyn, fakin nagh vod ad edyr cooishyn y vriwnys, ny foays y yannoo da deiney.
Toiggal er-y-fa shen nagh vel ad jeeghyn erbee, nagh gow-jee aggle roue.
Son cha vod ad edyr mollaght ny bannaght y chur er reeaghyn:
Chamoo oddys ad cowraghyn y hoilshaghey ’syn aer mastey ny hashoonee, ny soilshean myr y ghrian, ny soilshey ’choyrt myr yn eayst.
Ta ny beiyn maaish ny share na adsyn: son foddee ad geddyn fo fastee, as cooney lhieu-hene.
Cha vel eh eisht, er aght erbee, jeeaghyn dooinyn dy vel ad jeeghyn: shen-y-fa nagh gow-jee aggle roue.
Son myr nagh vel buggane-ushag ayns garey dy chucumberyn freayll veg: shen myr ta ny jeeghyn maidjey oc, ta coodit harrish lesh argid as airh.

As myrgeddin ny jeeghyn maidjey oc, ta coodit harrish lesh argid as airh, [t’ad] goll-rish drine gial ayns garey-mess, er ta dy chooilley ushag soie; as myrgeddin goll-rish corp marroo ta ceauit magh ’sy dorraghys.
As ver shiu enney orroo nagh nee jeeghyn erbee ad liorish yn gorrym-jiarg sollys ta gaase loau orroo: as vees adsyn ad-hene mow fy yerrey, as bee ad scammylt ayns y cheer.
Ny share er-y-fa shen ta’n dooinney cairal nagh vel echey jallooyn erbee: son bee eshyn foddey voish oltooan.
Va baghey ayns Babylon dooinney enmysit Joacim:
As ghow eh ben, va’n ennym eck Susanna, inneen Chelcias, ben feer waagh, as ’nane va goaill aggle roish y Chiarn.
Va’n ayr as y voir eck myrgeddin crauee, as dynsee ad yn inneen oc cordail rish leigh Voses.
Nish va Joacim dooinney mooar berchagh, as va prey aalin echey lhiantyn gys e hie: as huggeysyn ren ny Hewnyn taaghey; son dy row eh ny smoo ooasle na ooilley’n vooinjer elley.

Yn vlein cheddin va jees jeh shanstyryn y pobble pointit dy ve briwnyn, nyn lheid as ren y Chiarn loayrt jeu, dy daink meechairys voish Babylon, as voish briwnyn y chenn traa, va jeeaghyn myr dy beagh ad reill y pobble.
V’ad shoh cheet dy mennick gys thie Yoacim: as ooilley ny va cooishyn leigh erbee oc, haink ad huc.
Nish tra jimmee yn pobble roue ass y raad ec y vunlaa, hie Susanna ayns garey e sheshey dy walkal.
As honnick yn daa hanstyr ee goll ayn dy chooilley laa [as shooyl]; myr shen dy row yn yeearree oc jeant er-rouyl, huic.
As ren ad nyn aigney hene y ghoalley, as hyndaa ad ersooyl nyn sooillyn, nagh jinnagh ad jeeaghyn gys niau, ny geill y choyrt da briwnysyn cairagh.
As ga dy row ad ny-neesht er ny lhottey lesh y ghraih eck, foast cha by-loys da’n derrey yeh e heaghyn y hoilshaghey da’n jeh elley.
Son va nearey orroo dy ghoaill-rish nyn yeearree, dy row ad miandagh er geddyn dy yannoo maree.
Foast yeeagh ad magh dy jeidagh veih laa dy laa d’akin ee.
As dooyrt yn derrey yeh rish y jeh elley, Lhig dooin nish goll thie: son te traa-mrastyragh.

Myr shen tra v’ad ersooyl magh, scar ad veih my-cheilley, as chyndaa reesht haink ad gys yn un voayll; as lurg daue v’er vriaght eh my-cheilley yn oyr, ghow ad rish nyn yeearree: eisht phoint ad traa ny-neesht cooidjagh, tra oddagh ad geddyn ee ny lomarcan.
As haink eh gy kione myr v’ad fieau son traa jesh, dy jagh ee stiagh myr ollagh ee marish daa ven aeg ynrican, as v’ee aignagh dy niee ee-hene ’sy gharey: son ve cheh.
As cha row peccagh erbee ayns shen er-lhimmey jeh’n daa hanstyr, v’er n’ollaghey ad-hene, as ceau sooill urree.
As dooyrt ee rish ny mraane aegey eck, Cur-jee lhieu hym ooill as sheeabyn, as jeigh-jee dorryssyn y gharey, dy voddym mee-hene y niee.
As ren adsyn myr hir ee orroo [as] yeigh ad dorryssyn y gharey as hie ad-hene magh er dorryssyn dooint dy chur lhieu huic ny reddyn v’ee er ghra roo: agh cha vaik ad ny shanstyryn, son v’ad follit.
Nish tra va ny mraane aegey ersooyl magh, dirree yn daa hanstyr seose, as roie ad huic, gra,
Cur-my-ner, ta dorryssyn y gharey jeight, nagh lheear da dooinney erbee shin, as ta shinyn ayns graih rhyts; shen-y-fa cur dt’aigney lhien, as lhie marin.
Mannagh jean oo, nee mainyn feanish ymmyrkey dt’oi, dy row dooinney aeg mayrt: as er-y-fa shen hug oo dty vraane aegey ersooyl void.
Eisht dosnee Susanna, as dooyrt ee, Ta mee chionnt er dy chooilley heu: son my nee’ms yn red shoh, te baase dou: as mannagh jean-ym eh, cha voddym scapail ny laueyn euish.
Te ny share er-my-hon dy huittym ayns ny laueyn eu, as gyn dy yannoo eh, na dy chur-rish peccah ayns shilley’n Chiarn.
Er shen dyllee Susannah lesh ard-choraa: as dyllee yn daa hanstyr magh noi eck.
Eisht roie fer jeu, as doshil eh dorrys y gharey.
Myr shen tra cheayll sharvaantyn y thie yn yllagh ’sy gharey, ying ad stiagh er dorrys dooint, dy akin c’red va jeant ree.
Agh tra va ny shanstyryn er hoilshaghey nyn gooish, va ny sharvaantyn fo niart nearey: son cha row rieau roie lheid y goo shen jeh Susanna.
As haink eh gy kione laa-ny-vairagh, tra va’n pobble er haglym gys thie Yoacim e sheshey, dy daink ny shanstyryn myrgeddin lane dy spyrryd olkyssagh noi Susanna dy choyrt ee gy baase;
As dooyrt ad kiongoyrt rish y pobble. Cur-jee fys son Susanna, inneen Cheleias, ben Yoacim; as myr shen hug ad fys.
Myr shen haink ee marish e hayr as e moir, e cloan, as ooilley e kynney.
Nish va Susanna ben feer vettey, as slane-aalin dy yeeaghyn urree.
As hug ny drogh gheiney shoh sarey dy roostey’n eddin eck (son v’ee coodit) dy voddagh ad ve lhieent lesh yn aalid eck.
Shen-y-fa ren e caarjyn, as ooilley ny va fakin ee, keayney.
Eisht hass y daa hanstyr seose ayns mean y pobble, as lhie ad nyn laueyn er y chione eck.
As ish keayney, yeeagh ee seose gys niau: son va e cree treishteil ayns y Chiarn.
As dooyrt ny shanstyryn, Myr va shinyn shooyl ’sy gharey ny lomarcan, haink y ven shoh marish daa ven aeg, as jeigh dorryssyn y gharey, hug ee ny mraane aegey ersooyl.
Eisht dooinney aeg v’ayns shen follit, haink [eh] huic as lhie eh maree.
Eisht shinyn va nyn shassoo ayns corneil jeh’n gharey, fakin yn olk shoh, roie shin huc.
As tra honnick shin ad cooidjagh, yn dooinney cha dod shin y chummal: son v’eh ny stroshey na shin, as doshil eh yn dorrys, as lheim eh magh.
Agh er n’goaill y ven shoh, vrie shin quoi va’n dooinney aeg, agh cha jinnagh ee insh dooin: jeh ny reddyn shoh ta shinyn gymmyrkey feanish.
Eisht chreid yn cochruinnaght ad, myr she adsyn va shanstyryn as briwnyn y pobble: myr shen ren ad ee y gheyrey gy baase.
Eisht deie Susanna magh lesh ard-choraa, as dooyrt ee, O Yee dy bragh farraghtyn, ta toiggal ny folliaghtyn, as ayd ta fys er dy chooilley nhee ro-laue:
Ta fys ayds dy vel ad er n’ymmyrkey feanish foalsey m’oi, as cur-my ner, shegin dooys baase y hurranse; ga nagh ren mee rieau lheid ny reddyn as ta ny deiney shoh dy myskidagh er lhiassaghey m’oi.
As cheayll y Chiarn e coraa.
Shen-y-fa tra v’ee er ny leeideil dy ve currit dy baase, hrog y Chiarn seose spyrryd crauee scollag aeg; va’n ennym echey Daniel:
Quoi deie lesh coraa ard, Ta mish seyr voish fuill y ven shoh.
Eisht hyndaa ooilley’n sleih ad hene huggey, as dooyrt ad, Cre ta dy ve toiggit liorish ny focklyn shoh t’ou er loayrt?
Eisht, ny hassoo ’sy vean oc, dooyrt eh, Vel shiu lheid ny ommidanyn, shiuish vec Israel, dy vel shiu fegooish feyshtey ny toiggal jeh’n irriney, er gheyrey inneen jeh Israel?
Chyndaa-jee reesht gys ynnyd y vriwnys: son t’ad er n’ymmyrkey feanish foalsey n’oi eck.
Er-y-fa shen hyndaa ooilley’n pobble reesht dy tappee, as dooyrt ny shanstyryn rish, Tar, soie sheese ny mast’ ain, as insh dooin eh, fakin dy vel Jee er chur dhyt ooashley shanstyr.
Eisht dooyrt Daniel roo, Cur-jee yn jees shoh gys y derrey heu, yn derrey yeh foddey voish y jeh elley, as neem’s ad y eyshtey.

Myr shen tra v’ad er nyn scarrey yn derrey yeh veih’n yeh elley, deie eh er fer jeu, as dooyrt eh rish, O uss ta er n’aase shenn ayns drogh-yannoo, nish ta dty pheccaghyn t’ou hannah er n’yannoo er heet gys soilshey.
Son t’ou er n’ockley magh briwnys foalsey, as er gheyrey yn ôney, as er n’eaysley yn kyndagh; son ooilley as dy vel yn Chiarn gra, Yn oney as ynrick cha jean oo y stroie.
Nish eisht, my t’ou er vakin ee, insh dou, Fo cre’n billey honnick oo ad ny-neesht cooidjagh? Dreggyr eshyn, Fo billey-mastic.
As dooyrt Daniel, Feer vie; t’ou dty vreagerey noi dty chione hene; son eer nish ta ainle Yee er gheddyn briwnys Yee dy dty ghiarey ayns jees.

Er shen hug eh gys y derrey heu eh, as doardee eh yn fer elley dy v’er ny choyrt lesh, as dooyrt eh rish, O uss jeh sheel Chanaan, as cha nee jeh Juda, aalid t’er dty volley, as ta saynt er chamlaagey dty chree.
Shoh myr ta shiu er ghellal rish inneenyn Israel as er n’agglaghey ad myr shen dy jagh ad ry-heshiaght meriu: agh inneen Yuda cha goghe [ee] jeh’n veechraueeaght eu.
Nish er-y-fa shen insh dou, Fo cre’n billey ghow uss ad ny-neesht cooidjagh? Dansoor eh, Fo billey-hollin.
Eisht dooyrt Daniel rish, Mie; t’ou uss neesht dy vreagerey noi dty chione hene: son ta ainle Yee farkiaght lesh y chliwe dy dty yiarey ayns jees, dy vod eh oo y stroie.
Er shen dyllee yn slane chaglym lesh coraa ard, as ren ad Jee y voylley, ta sauail adsyn ta treishteil aynsyn.
As dirree ad n’oi yn daa hanstyr (son ren Daniel magh ad dy ve feanishyn foalsey liorish nyn meeal hene).
As cordail rish leigh Voses, ren ad roo ’naght myr chiare adsyn dy goanlyssagh dy yannoo rish nyn naboo: as hug ad dy baase ad. Myr shoh va’n uill gyn loght er ny hauail yn laa cheddin.
Shen-y-fa ren Chelcias as e ven Jee y voylley son Susanna nyn inneen, marish Joacim e sheshey, as ooilley’n kynney, er-yn-oyr as nagh row neu-ynrickys er ny gheddyn ayn-jee.
Veih’n laa shen magh va goo mooar ec Daniel ayns shilley’n pobble.
As va ree Astyages er ny haglym gys e ayraghyn, as ghow Cyrus jeh Persia yn reeriaght echey.
As va Daniel ainjyssagh er y ree, as goit dy mie erskyn ooilley e chaarjyn.
Nish va jalloo ec ny Babylonianee enmysit Bel, as va baarit er dy chooilley laa daa howse jeig liauyr dy flooyr meein, as daeed keyrrey, as shey siyn feeyney.
As hug y ree ooashley da, as hie eh stiagh gagh laa dy choyrt arrym da; agh dooashlee Daniel e Yee hene. As dooyrt y ree rish, Kys nagh vel uss gooashlaghey Bel?
Dansoor eshyn as dooyrt eh, Er-y-fa nagh voddyms gooashlaghey jallooyn jeant lesh laueyn, agh y Jee bio, t’er chroo niau as thalloo, as echey ta’n ard-phooar harrish dy chooilley eill.
Eisht dooyrt y ree rish, Nee smooinaghtyn t’ou nagh vel Bel ny Yee bio? nagh vel oo fakin cre wheesh as t’eh gee as giu dy chooilley laa?
Eisht ren Daniel smooirooil as gra, O ree, nagh bee er dty volley: son cha vel shoh agh cray cheu-sthie as prash cheu-mooie, as cha ren eh rieau gee ny giu nhee erbee.
Er shen va’n ree jymmoosagh, as deie eh son e haggyrtyn, as dooyrt eh roo, Mannagh ninsh shiuish dooys quoi ta gee ooilley ny reddyn shoh, shegin diu ve currit dy baase.

Agh my oddys shiu prowal dooys dy vel Bel gee ad, eisht shegin da Daniel ’ve currit dy baase: son t’eh er loayrt goan mollaghtagh noi Bel. As dooyrt Daniel rish y ree, Lhig da ’ve cordail rish dty ghoo.
(Nish va saggyrtyn Bel three-feed as jeih, cheumooie jeh ny mraane as chloan oc); as hie’n ree marish Daniel stiagh ayns chiamble Bel.
Er shen dooyrt saggyrtyn Bel, Cur-my-ner, hed mainyn magh: agh uss, O ree, kiartee yn bee, as fow aarloo yn feeyn, as jeigh yn dorrys dy shickyr, as seal eh lesh dty chowrey hene;
As mairagh tra hig oo stiagh, mannagh vow uss dy vel Bel er n’ee seose ooilley, surree mainyn baase; er-nonney Daniel, ta loayrt dy foalsey nyn ’oi.
As choont ad beg jeh: son fo’n voayrd v’ad er n’yannoo fosley follit, er hie ad stiagh dy kinjagh, as stroie ad ny reddyn shoh.

Myr shen tra v’ad er n’gholl magh, hoie yn ree beaghey roish Bel. Nish va Daniel er n’oardrail da e harvaantyn ad dy chur lhieu leoie, as dy skeayley eh trooid-magh ooilley’n chiamble kionenee yn ree ny-lomarcan: eisht hie ad magh as jeigh ad y dorrys, as seal ad eh lesh cowrey’n ree, as hie ad rhymboo.
Nish ayns yn oie haink ny saggyrtyn, marish nyn mraane as nyn gloan, (myr bollagh ad), as ren ad gee as giu seose ooilley.
Ayns y voghrey dy moghey dirree yn ree, as Daniel marish.
As dooyrt y ree, Ghaniel, Vel ny sealyn slane? as dooyrt eshyn, Ta, O ree, t’ad slane.
As cha leah as doshil eh’n dorrys, yeeagh y ree er y voayrd, as deie eh lesh coraa ard, S’mooar t’ou uss, O Bel, as mayrt’s cha vel molteyrys erbee.
Eisht ghear Daniel, as chum eh yn ree nagh darragh eh stiagh, as dooyrt eh, Jeeagh er y laare, as gow tastey vie jeh quoi ny kesmadyn-cass ad shoh.
As dooyrt ee, Hee’m kesmadyn-cass deiney, mraane, as paitchyn. As eisht va’n ree jymmoosagh.
As goaill ny saggyrtyn marish nyn mraane as paitchyn, yeeagh ad da yn dorrys follit raad haink ad stiagh dy stroie, lheid ny reddyn as v’er y voayrd.
Shen-y-fa varr y ree ad, as livrey eh Bel gys pooar Ghaniel, quoi stroie eh-hene as e hiamble.
As ’syn ynnyd cheddin va Dragon mooar, da hug mooinjer Vabylon ooashley.
As dooyrt y ree rish Daniel, Jean oo myrgeddin gra dy vel shoh dy phrash? Jeeagh, t’eh bio, t’eh gee as giu; cha vod oo gra nagh vel eh shoh ny Yee bio: er-y-fa shen cur ooashley da.
Eisht dooyrt Daniel rish y ree, Verryms ooashley da’n Chiarn my Yee: son she eshyn y Jee bio.
Agh cur kied dou, O ree, as nee’m yn Dragon shoh y stroie fegooish cliwe ny lorg. Dooyrt y ree, Ta mish cur kied dhyt.

Eisht ghow Daniel pick, as geirr, as geaysh, as vroie eh cooidjagh ad, as ren eh crammanyn y yannoo jeh’n chooid cheddin: shoh hug eh ayns beeal y Dragon, as lesh va’n Dragon er ny scoltey veih my cheilley: as dooyrt Daniel, Cur-my-ner, ad shoh ny jeeghyn ta shiuish dyn ooashlaghey.

Tra va mooinjer Vabylon er chlashtyn shen v’ad corree, as hug ad nyn goyrle dy-cheilleynoi’n ree, gra, Ta’n ree er jeet dy ve ny Hew, as, t’eh er stroie Bel, as t’eh er varroo yn Dragon, as er choyrt ny saggyrtyn dy baase.
Myr shen haink ad gys y ree, as dooyrt ad, Livrey hooin Daniel er-nonney nee mayd uss y stroie as dty hie.
Nish tra honnick y ree dy row ad chionney er dy creoi, v’eh eignit as livrey eh Daniel huc:
As hilg ad eh ayns ooig ny lionyn: raad v’eh son shey laa.
As ayns yn ooig va shiaght lionyn, as v’ad er choyrt daue dy chooilley laa daa chonvayrt, as daa cheyrrey: nagh row er ny choyrt daue tra shen, jerkal dy jinnagh ad gee Daniel.
Nish va ayns Jewry phadeyr enmysit Habbacuc, v’er n’yannoo poddash, as er vrishee arran ayns meilley, as v’eh goll gys y vagher dy chur lesh eh gys ny beayneeyn.
Agh dooyrt ainle y Chiarn rish Habbacuc, Immee, cur lhiat yn jinnair shen t’ayd gys Babylon gys Daniel, quoi t’ayns ooig ny lionyn.
As dooyrt Habbacuc, Hiarn, cha vaik mish rieau Babylon; chamoo ta fys aym c’raad ta’n ooig.
Eaisht ghow ainle y Chiarn eh er mullagh e vollag, as hrog eh seose eh liorish folt e chione, as liorish jeeanid e spyrryd hug eh sheese eh ayns Babylon harrish yn ooig.
As deie Habbacuc, gra, Ghaniel, Ghaniel, gow yn jinnair ta Jee er choyrt hood.
As dooyrt Daniel, T’ou uss er chooinaghtyn orrym, O Yee: chamoo t’ou er hreigeil adsyn ta shirrey er-dty-hon’s as ta graihagh ort.
Myr shen dirree Daniel, as ren eh gee: as hug ainle Chiarn Habbacuc ayns e ynnyd hene reesht er-y-chooyl.
Er y chiaghtoo laa hie’n ree dy ghobberan son Daniel: as tra haink eh gys yn ooig, yeeagh eh ayn, as cur-my-ner, va Daniel ny hoie.
Eisht deie yn ree lesh coraa ard, gra, S’mooar t’ou uss, O Chiarn Jee Ghaniel, as cha vel unnane erbee ta corrym rhyts.
As hayrn eh magh eh, as hilg eh adsyn va oyr e hoyrt-mow ayns yn ooig: as v’ad er nyn stroie ayns meekey kiongoyrt rish e eddin.
